```
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback
# eth0 network device
auto eth0
iface eth0 inet static
    address 172.17.0.2
    netmask 255.255.0.0
    gateway 172.17.0.1
    dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8 4.4.4.4
auto eth1
allow-hotplug eth1
iface eth1 inet dhcp
```

```
admin@myhome:~$ ifconfig eth0 192.168.1.2 netmask 255.255.255.0
admin@myhome:~$ ifconfig eth0 up
```
